checkAction

public void checkAction(jade.security.JADEPrincipal requester,
                        java.security.Permission permission,

                        jade.security.Credentials credentials)
                 throws jade.security.JADESecurityException
Description copied from interface: JADEAccessController
Check whether the requester can perform the action on the given target. The requestor's credentials can be provided (or 'null' can be passed).

setNameAuthority

public void setNameAuthority(NameAuthority nameAuthority)
(optionally) it can be associated a NameAuthority, so that when a principal does not have a known local alias, a NameCertificate is retrieved. The local alias used is the name contained into the certificate.
